Tari Eason expressed his dislike for the Warriors postgame.
Ime Udoka showed willingness to go deep into the roster to find a way to win.
Kerr praised Kuminga's ability to beat switches and get downhill, noting his fantastic performance.
Podziemski reflected on his scoring approach, emphasizing the importance of playing at his own pace.
Steve Kerr expressed pride in the team's response to Houston's second-half onslaught and highlighted the importance of the experience for future games.
Warriors: Golden State continued to win without Curry, improving to 5-1 this season. The team said he will be re-evaluated Sunday to see how much longer he’ll be out.
Rockets: Houston played much better after halftime than it did in an awful first half but couldn’t close it out to build on consecutive wins at San Antonio and Dallas.
